name: Soldiers
content: We're at the end of the road
We're all soldiers on our own
我们都是只能靠自己的战士
Tryna find our way back home
And at the end of the day
Just the love that we have made
So let's let go of our mistakes
所以让我们放下我们犯过的错
我们都有一颗易碎的心
No matter how the light may fade
我们也会一往无前 这就是我们的个性
Wе work so hard that we forget
我们如此拼命 以至于忘记了
So let's all hold each other close
所以让我们紧紧拥抱彼此
因为有好多事情我们无法控制
But we don't have to feel alone
但我们不需要独自面对
所以让我们勇敢一点 让我们鼓起勇气
让我们低下头 祷告片刻
No matter how the light may fade
我们也会一往无前 这就是我们的个性
And now our hearts will beat as one
现在我们的心会一同跳动
And now our hearts will beat
And after all came the sun
And now our hearts will beat
Now our hearts will beat as one
现在我们的心会一同跳动
